title: Technical Research and Feasibility Analysis for Autonomous Driving Simulation
theme: Assessing technical requirements and feasibility for building a self-driving car simulation environment
subtopics: Review of existing simulation platforms and tools
Identification of key functional and non-functional requirements
Stakeholder interviews and use case gathering
Feasibility study on sensor simulation accuracy
Risk assessment for project scope and technology choices
Legal and ethical considerations in simulation data
Documentation of research findings and recommendations
key_technical_milestones: Feasibility report on sensor simulation technologies
Risk assessment and mitigation plan finalized
technical_continuity_hooks: Feeds into architecture and environment setup
Defines technical constraints for core development
Informs resource allocation and timeline planning
